Content-Type: text/plain; charset=windows-1252
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Lord Elder continues to pound away at the air, with the Ark and shuttle bat=
teries opening up on the one Minion who is present: Tumult! The minion is f=
ast and agile, using the air to his best advantage, and the sweeps that lit=
ter the skies almost as cover. The single minion takes off, drawing fire aw=
ay from the besieging sweeps, his agility serving him in good stead as he m=
aneuvers tightly in the skies, his armor becoming peppered with the few sho=
ts fortunate enough to actually hit him!

---------------------------------=
-----------

Meanwhile Legacy=92s shielding continues to hold due to a new =
influx of power coming from the Ark. With a renewed vigor Legacy=92s weapon=
s orient on the incoming minion sweeps and fires, a bright flash of light e=
rupting from his primary cannon mount. His armored tank mode a stalwart def=
ender of the ark! 
 
--------------------------------------------

As this =
happened twin missiles fly out from just behind the main part of the battle=
 lines, sailing through the midst of the host of sweeps fixing themselves o=
n target. With a burst of power Jhiaxus=92 missiles push forward towards Tu=
mult! 

The minion soldier for his part has not been paying the proper atte=
ntion, seeing as he has been spending his time avoiding the copious amounts=
 of fire power coming from the Maximals and Autbots at the ark - so it is n=
ot until the last second that his proximity and lock on alerts come to life=
, just before Jhiaxus=92 missiles hit him dead on and his world erupts in l=
ight and pain!!

At the same time Myrmidon fired several shots at the encro=
aching sweeps, keeping them off Jhiaxus! However the six-changer takes seve=
ral hits as well, the last few biting through his armor! He begins to circl=
e towards the ground!

--------------------------------------------

Nighst=
rike DarkFate moved closer the ark and opened fire against it, their twin f=
ire power opening a new level of explosive power against the ark=92s shield=
 strength. Once again the shielding flicker, stutters and then with a sicke=
ning suddenness the shield dies, as what appears to be a ball of darkness e=
ngulfs the immediate area around the ark!

--------------------------------=
------------

Meanwhile Scorponok=92s tail attacks are remarkably effective=
. Perhaps they were not expecting something like that, or perhaps something=
 else is brewing in the air! At any rate twin explosions appear as two more=
 sweeps fall to the ground. Four are left, flying attack patterns, harrying=
 the lone Scorponok!  But they are now more wary and cautious then before a=
s they fire again and weave their way through the air around him. 

-------=
-------------------------------------

Hydras=92 transformation into beast =
mode causes the sweeps attacking him to back up for a moment as several are=
 fried by the outpouring of heat and fire! Decibel for her part pulled up, =
allowing the sweeps to take the brunt of the attack. =93Is that all you got=
. Bad breath???=94 She howls with laughter as she banks around, =93Take a t=
ic tac!=94 she fires twin missiles at Hydras as the other sweeps come aroun=
d to also help her take on the predicon commander!

-----------------------=
---------------------

Cyclonus watched as Dark Rodimus came down, as a str=
ange calmness emanating from him.  Rodimus=92 kick is perhaps faster than c=
yclonus had anticipated or perhaps he simply allowed it to hit, in either c=
ase the minion commander rolled with the sweeping kick and hit the ground s=
houlder first and continued spinning to rise elegantly to his feet. 

Cyclo=
nus shook his head as he looked at Rodimus rather than attacking, =93The po=
wer you once had, the power of the matrix, its wisdom, its knowledge is now=
 coursing through my circuits. I have power you do not yet understand, or p=
erhaps have just forgotten. You are less than what you were before and I am=
 more. How do you propose to beat me?=94

Cyclonus shrugged slightly as he =
settled into a combat stance, his palms beginning to glow once more, =93Wer=
e it up to me I would let you live. But it is not up to me.=94 Cyclonus ges=
tured to Rodimus to attack when he was ready, =93Come to your death, Unicro=
n has decreed it!=94 

Preston
(Da=92minion)
